verses.kjv: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
verses.ct: LORD, my heart isn't proud, and my eyes aren't arrogant. I don't concern myself with things too great or too complex for me to understand.

verses.kjv: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
verses.ct: Instead, I have calmed and settled my soul. Like a child resting peacefully against its mother after being weaned â€” that is how my soul rests within me.

verses.kjv: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
verses.ct: Israel, put your hope in the LORD, from now until the end of time.
